abstract: The acquisition, Google’s largest ever, would turn the maker of the Android mobile operating system into a full-fledged cellphone manufacturer, in direct competition with Apple.
snippet: The acquisition, Google’s largest ever, would turn the maker of the Android mobile operating system into a full-fledged cellphone manufacturer, in direct competition with Apple.

headline.main: Google to Buy Motorola Mobility for $12.5 Billion

byline.original: By Evelyn M. Rusli and Claire Cain Miller
